TERMS OF SERVICE
Effective Date: [Insert Date]
Company Name: [Your Cyprus Company Name]

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our home exchange platform ("Platform"), operated by [Your Company], a company registered in the Republic of Cyprus. By using the Platform, you agree to these Terms.

1. Overview
Our Platform allows users to exchange homes on a non-monetary basis for vacation or temporary stays. We are not a real estate agency or broker. We provide tools to find properties via a map interface, communicate with other users via in-app messaging, and manage your listings.
2. Eligibility
You must be 18 years or older to use the Platform. By registering, you confirm that:
You have the legal right to offer the property listed (ownership or permission).
You are solely responsible for ensuring the exchange is lawful under local rules.
3. Subscription and Fees
A standard annual subscription fee is charged to access the full Platform.
You may choose an optional visibility boost to feature your property in search results for an additional fee.
All fees are clearly displayed before payment. No hidden charges.
Subscription fees are non-refundable unless otherwise required by law.
4. Nature of Exchange
Exchanges are non-commercial and based on mutual agreement between users.
We are not responsible for ensuring that an exchange is completed.
Users negotiate and agree independently; we do not verify the content or suitability of properties.
5. User Conduct
You agree to:
Provide accurate information and photographs
Keep your availability calendar up-to-date
Communicate respectfully with other users
Avoid discriminatory or unlawful conduct
You may not:
Offer properties you donâ€™t have rights to
Use the Platform for any paid rentals
Circumvent fees or attempt to transact off-platform
6. In-App Messaging
The Platform includes secure in-app messaging. Users must use this system for communication related to exchanges. Misuse of messaging may result in account suspension.
7. Search and Listings
The map-based search function is provided as-is. Featured listings are based on location, relevance, and any applied visibility boosts.
8. Liability and Disclaimers
We do not inspect or endorse any property.
We are not liable for damages, loss, or disputes resulting from exchanges. If you are concerned about this matter check insurance packages.
Use the Platform at your own risk.
Users are encouraged to confirm insurance coverage for guests.
9. Termination
We may suspend or terminate your access for violations of these Terms or legal requirements. You may close your account at any time.
10. Privacy
Your personal data is handled under our [Privacy Policy]. We comply with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
These Terms are governed by the laws of Cyprus. Any dispute arising shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Cypriot courts.

By registering or using the Platform, you confirm your agreement to these Terms.

privacy.content:
Effective Date: [Insert Date]
Company Name: [Your Cyprus Company Name]
Company Address: [Your Registered Address in Cyprus]
Contact Email: [Support Email or DPO Email]
This Privacy Policy explains how [Your Company] collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our home exchange platform (the "Platform"). We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

1. Data Controller
The data controller is [Your Company], a company registered in Cyprus. You may contact us at the email provided above.
2. What Data We Collect
We may collect the following types of data:
Account Information: Name, email, password (hashed), preferred language
Profile and Property Data: Property description, photos, address (approximate location for map), availability calendar
Usage Data: IP address, browser type, device information, usage logs
Messages: Contents of in-app communications between users
Payment Information: Processed securely by third-party payment processors; we do not store credit card numbers
3. How We Use Your Data
We use your data to:
Create and manage your account
Display listings and facilitate exchanges
Provide customer support
Improve and secure our Platform
Comply with legal obligations
4. Legal Basis for Processing
We rely on the following legal bases:
Your consent (e.g., for marketing emails)
Performance of a contract (e.g., fulfilling your subscription)
Legal obligation (e.g., accounting records)
Legitimate interests (e.g., preventing fraud, improving services)
5. Sharing Your Data
We do not sell your data. We share your data with:
Hosting providers (EU-based)
Payment processors (GDPR-compliant)
Email services (e.g., transactional messages)
Legal authorities when required
All third parties are bound by confidentiality and data processing agreements.
6. International Data Transfers
Your data is stored in the EU. If transferred outside the EU, we ensure appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).
7. Data Retention
We retain your data as long as your account is active and for legal or operational reasons thereafter. You can delete your account at any time.
8. Your Rights
Under GDPR, you have the right to:
Access your personal data
Correct or update data
Request erasure
Restrict or object to processing
Data portability
Withdraw consent at any time
To exercise your rights, contact us at [Contact Email].
9. Cookies and Tracking
We use cookies for:
Login and session management
Site performance analytics
Improving user experience
You can manage cookie preferences through our cookie banner or browser settings.
10. Changes to This Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes.

If you have concerns about how we process your data, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Cyprus Commissioner for Personal Data Protection or your local data authority.

cookies.content:
COOKIE POLICY
Effective Date: [Insert Date]
Company Name: [Your Cyprus Company Name]

This Cookie Policy explains how our home exchange platform ("Platform") uses cookies and similar technologies to provide, personalize, and improve your experience.

1. What Are Cookies?
Cookies are small text files placed on your device to help websites function effectively and collect information about your visit.

2. Types of Cookies We Use
- Essential Cookies: Required for core functionality (e.g., login, language preferences).
- Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site (e.g., Google Analytics).
- Functionality Cookies: Remember preferences and enhance usability.
- Advertising Cookies (Optional): Used to display relevant advertising (only with your consent).

3. How to Control Cookies
When you visit our Platform, you are given the option to accept or reject non-essential cookies through our cookie banner.

You can also control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling some cookies may impact the functionality of the Platform.

4. Third-Party Cookies
We may allow trusted third-party services (e.g., analytics providers) to place cookies. These providers have their own privacy and cookie policies.

5. Updates to This Policy
We may update this Cookie Policy. Significant changes will be notified on our website.

If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at [Support Email].
